packages.description:
## Package overview

This package provides functions to retrieve information about the operating system and the current users of the operating system.

For information on the operations, which you can perform with the os package, see the below **Functions**.

returnParameters.description: Environment variable value if it exists or else an empty string

functions.name: getEnv
functions.description:
Returns the environment variable value associated with the provided name.
```ballerina
string port = os:getEnv("HTTP_PORT");
```

returnParameters.description: Current user's home directory if it can be determined or else an empty string

functions.name: getUserHome
functions.description:
Returns the current user's home directory path.
```ballerina
string userHome = os:getUserHome();
```

returnParameters.description: Current user's name if it can be determined or else an empty string

functions.name: getUsername
functions.description:
Returns the current user's name.
```ballerina
string username = os:getUsername();
```
